name: Wizard's Legacy
storyline: Are you ready to feel the magic at your fingertips, go on an unforgettable adventure, and be part of an epic story in a fantastical world? Explore the depths of mysterious dungeons and embark on an epic journey in Wizards Legacy! As a desperate father seeking a cure for his ailing child, you must delve into the heart of darkness, facing untold perils and ancient evils to earn the favor of Hex’O’Cura. Witness the unfolding tales of lost souls and uncover the secret of The Corruption. Be the powerful wizard that you have always meant to be in this action-adventure of the past as you venture deeper into the roguelite game!
summary: Wizard’s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.
